question: Tell me about a time when you had to present financial results to non-financial stakeholders.
How would you evaluate whether a new product launch was financially successful?
Describe a time when you identified a cost-saving opportunity.
How do you prioritize strategic initiatives when resources are limited?
Walk me through how you would build a financial model for a subscription business.
Tell me about a time when your financial analysis changed a business decision.
How would you approach building a 3-year strategic plan for a new business unit?
